name: JooseMod: Telekinesis, Experience and Mastery
description:
Mod made by JooseMann! Adds Telekinesis, and the Experience / Mastery enchantments.
Telekinesis: Blocks mined automatically get teleported to you. Can be toggled on and off with a hotkey (see controls).
Experience: Enchantment that increases the experience gained from mining blocks.
Mastery: Enchantment that increases experience gained from killing mobs.

Enjoy!! :)
